about_the_game:
When a Story is as cruel and dark as it gets, They are transformed in a legend. The set or group of these legends, which added to the customs and art of a people, is what we call folklore.

You're about to find out what happens when you get too close...

Infinity Green Game Studio proudly presents Folklore: Shadows of the Shackled, a first-person psychological horror game inspired by Brazilian folklore. Explore the depths of an old Estate haunted by entities (from the past). Survive the darkness of basements/cellar and hidden passages, solve riddles of bloody rituals, and discover the wicked secrets of an ancient Brazil dominated by the scars of slavery.

But you won't be alone. The most popular trickster spirit in the Brazilian collective imagination will keep you company throughout the dangerous journey that will break the limits of time, reason and fear.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content
